mapper.insert: INSERT INTO handleCache ( TIME1, RECEIVE, DROP1, REPLY, AVG_REP_TIME, SUCCESS, OTHER, SUCCESS_RATE, HIT_RATE, RECUR, AVG_RECUR_TIME, RECUR_SUCCESS, ALL_RECEIVE, total_time, HANDLE, DNS, OID, ECODE, GS1, deviceIp, currentTime ) VALUES ( #{TIME}, #{RECEIVE}, #{DROP}, #{REPLY}, #{AVG_REP_TIME}, #{SUCCESS}, #{OTHER}, #{SUCCESS_RATE}, #{HIT_RATE}, #{RECUR}, #{AVG_RECUR_TIME}, #{RECUR_SUCCESS}, #{ALL_RECEIVE}, #{total_time}, #{HANDLE}, #{DNS}, #{OID}, #{ECODE}, #{GS1}, #{deviceIp}, #{currentTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM handleCache WHERE DATE_FORMAT(currentTime, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(currentTime, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND deviceIp = #{deviceIp}
